A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Okay so here it is\, I have loved Star Wars my entire life\, I grew up watching the prequels and the original series\, I loved episode 7 it made me feel like a kid again\, it got me back into Star Wars... this one is Disney’s Star Wars it’s not George Lucas or even JJ’s Star Wars\, they took something serious and something that had story and they Thor Ragnaroked it... made it funny and crapped all over lifelong fans\, a lot of people will like it and a lot won’t like it... it has me feeling mixed\, it’s not bad and it’s not good\, but it is a must see since we’re getting 6 more movies!
